title: Cannon minion bug
body: The cannon minion just got stuck and isn't attacking. Hope riot can fix soon.

replies.body: Hes like "Nope im outta here boys"
Not just a cannon minion bug, it can happen to any minion.
I'd be happy if it were one of mine, so the enemy would have to be punished to get it, but it wouldn't sit right with me after a while and I'd let them take it.
